original_title: Sir John Soane: An English Architect, An American Legacy
overview: All great art engages in a dialogue with the past. Architecture is no exception, as this film shows in its examination of the legacy of Sir John Soane (1753-1837), an English architect of rare genius whose influence on a generation of America's foremost architects is profound.
title: Sir John Soane: An English Architect, An American Legacy
